Detailed Description

Base class to derive from for use as user buffer.

Examples
edgedetect_cuda.cpp, edgedetect_opencl.cpp, and user_buffer.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

◆ RegisterMemory()

void NeoAPI::BufferBase::RegisterMemory ( void *  memory,
size_t  size 
)

will assign a memory object for use as a buffer

If the buffer object is not assigned to a camera object it is valid to assign a new memory. When it is allready assigned to a camera object NeoAPI::InvalidArgumentException will be thrown.

Parameters
[in]memoryaddress to the memory
[in]sizesize of the memory
Returns
void
Exceptions
InvalidArgumentExceptionwhen arguments changed and allready assigned to a camera object
Examples
edgedetect_cuda.cpp, edgedetect_opencl.cpp, and user_buffer.cpp.

◆ UnregisterMemory()

void NeoAPI::BufferBase::UnregisterMemory ( )

unregister a previous assigned memory

If the buffer object is assigned to a camera the buffer will be revoked automatically.

Returns
void
Examples
edgedetect_cuda.cpp, edgedetect_opencl.cpp, and user_buffer.cpp.
